title: WS Classification Provided
fullText:
Wiring systems, including their supports, supplying safety services consisting of: (a) consumer mains; (b) generator supplies; (c) normal supplies; (d) alternate supplies; and (e) supplies to outbuildings, and fire-isolated portions of buildings,
shall comply with AS/NZS 3013, with a WS classification as specified by the Standard relevant to the installation of such equipment.
note: See Appendix H for further information regarding the application of the WS classification system.
